akn:section.akn:heading: Disclaimer of intention to prohibit normal dealing

akn:content.akn:p: § 2304. Disclaimer of intention to prohibit normal dealing Nothing in this chapter shall prevent handlers and producers from selecting their customers and suppliers for any reason other than a producer’s membership in or contract with an association of producers, nor require a handler to deal with an association of producers. (Pub. L. 90–288, § 5, Apr. 16, 1968, 82 Stat. 95.)
